channel.title: Connection Error
channel.description:
Hi, I am very new to private servers and am sorry if this is a common/easy problem to fix but whenever I log into my server it instantly says "connection lost" and logs me out. Both the server and client seem to be running fine until this happens. Here is a picture of what the server does when I log in: [url=http://postimg.org/image/nt9eq6won/][img]http://s7.postimg.org/nt9eq6won/RSPS.jpg[/img][/url]
I am using the source and client from a 2006 rs remake here:
[url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/519964-f2p2006-rs-remake-2-years-work.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/519964-f2p2006-rs-remake-2-years-work.html[/url]
Any help is highly appreciated. Thank you for your time.

item.title: Connection Error
item.dc:creator: @greetnskeet greetnskeet
item.description:
@greetnskeet wrote:

Hi, I am very new to private servers and am sorry if this is a common/easy problem to fix but whenever I log into my server it instantly says “connection lost” and logs me out.
Both the server and client seem to be running fine until this happens. Here is a picture of what the server does when I log in:

I am using the source and client from a 2006 rs remake here:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/519964-f2p2006-rs-remake-2-years-work.html
